GizmoTheFoxCCMod_Character.name: Gizmo
GizmoTheFoxCCMod_Character.description: Your artificer/alchemist. His cards allow you to <c=boldPink>brew potions</c> (temporary 0-cost cards granting benefits) by <c=boldPink>attuning</c> the four elements.

Add Cantrip A.name: Add 1 of 4 Cantrips A to Hand
Add Cantrip A.description: Add 1 of 4 <c=card>cantrips</c> with A upgrades to your hand.

Add Cantrip B.name: Add 1 of 4 Cantrips B to Hand
Add Cantrip B.description: Add 1 of 4 <c=card>cantrips</c> with B upgrades to your hand.

Attunement.name: Attunement
Attunement.description: Currently <c=boldPink>attuned</c> elements. When all elements are <c=boldPink>attuned</c>, add 1 of 3 <c=boldPink>potions</c> to your hand.
